attributes.action: More privileged people pay more tax, and it’s evenly distributed.
attributes.additional_details: There are many people especially in London and the surrounding areas who struggle to pay rent, buy food and even give their children and education (allow them to study at university). Although the government already provide a lot for those with less money, there is still a lot more that can be done.
attributes.background: The government had the power to choose who receives tax money, therefore they should distribute it more evenly to help the citizens and people of there constituencies. If they did this there would be less poverty and the government could focus on other issues such as climate change and racism.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You might like to sign the following petitions:

Introduce a new top rate of income tax for highest earners
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/568669

Take action to address the rising levels of child poverty
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/552744

Increase government funding for the provision of social housing.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/573198
